TopicTitle: Sector Seven Space Laboratories Spaceplane Runway (On The Mun)

Articles.Content:
After testing we found that the runway was not sturdy enough and would need to be very long to be a functional landing strip, the work was great for learning and brought new ideas to mind for later projects. Had a lot of fun with this one, hope you enjoy the pictures on the link provided.

http://i.imgur.com/uSxRTTL.png?1' alt='uSxRTTL.png?1'>

http://imgur.com/gallery/ZbOwF/new
